name: git_challenge
description: This repo contains information and files related to my GitHub Challenge from 8/23/16 - 9/23/16. I intend to: 1.  Complete the code school course "Try Ruby" 2. Otherwise, I will complete another code School course or seek other resources and tutorials 4.  I will research and attempt to rebuild a previous basic app/assignment using new technology.
